I am skilled in sales and lead generation, utilizing advanced communication skills to foster teamwork and drive customer-centric solutions. My self-driven approach complements my ability to implement conflict resolution strategies while maintaining a focus on service excellence. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in using **Microsoft Office** for documentation and reporting purposes.
